button.label: Make It Same Size
button.supertip: Make the height and width of all selected shapes based on the first selected shape's dimensions. You need to select at least two shapes.

button.label: Make It Same Height
button.supertip: Make the height of all selected shapes based on the first selected shape's height. You need to select at least two shapes.

button.label: Make It Same Width
button.supertip: Make the width of all selected shapes based on the first selected shape's width. You need to select at least two shapes.

button.label: Move Left
button.supertip: Move the second selected shape next to first selected shape. You need to select two shapes.

button.label: Move Bottom
button.supertip: Move the second selected shape to bottom of first selected shape. You need to select two shapes.

button.label: Swap Shapes
button.supertip: Swap the locations of two shapes. You need to select two shapes.

button.label: Make It Same Color
button.supertip: Make the fill color of all selected shapes based on first selected shape's color. You need to select at least two shapes.

button.label: Replace 2 Colors
button.screentip: Replace two colors entered by user

button.label: Ungroup All Groups
button.screentip: Ungroup all grouped shapes in the presentation

button.label: Spell Check All Slides in English
button.supertip: Spell checking for entire document by setting proof language to UK English

button.label: Find All Colors
button.screentip: Find all colors on a new slide at the end of the document

button.label: Find Texts Smaller Than 12
button.screentip: Find all texts with font size smaller than 12

button.label: Find Fonts Used Other Than Arial
button.screentip: Find all texts with font other than Arial
